name: WebGLRenderingContext.isTexture
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.isTexture() method of the WebGL API returns true if the passed WebGLTexture is valid and false otherwise.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'isTexture' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.

refs.name: OpenGL ES 2.0
refs.description: The definition of 'glIsTexture' in the 'OpenGL ES 2.0' specification.
